entry.title: Jolly Rancher Chews Original Flavors Candy 6.5 oz - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Candy
Price: 42.00

Chewy Jolly Rancher Candy

Give your customers their favourite retro candy but in a delicious chewy form! The Jolly Rancher Chews Original Flavors Candy come in an assortment of yummy fruity flavours like Green Apple, Blue Raspberry, Cherry, and Watermelon. These candies are bursting with all the fresh and yummy sweetness of Summer so you'll feel warm even in the Canadain Winter!

Spread the jolly sweetness to your customers with the Jolly rancher Chews Original Flavors Candy!

6.5 oz. Bags | 12 Count Box

Fresh Retro Candy Shipped Fast at Wholesale Prices!

entry.title: Jolly Rancher Bites Sour Chewy Candy - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Candy
Price: 42.00

Keep on Sucking Jolly Rancher Candy

This yummy candy bites back, well just a little! The Jolly Rancher Bites Sour Chewy Candy is always juicy, fruity, and filled with a perfect sour tang! Bite-sized candies that are sure to get your mouth watering! These chewy sour candies come in Watermelon, Green Apple, Cherry and Orange. Jolly Rancher Bites Sour Chewy Candies make it easy to share, but they're also ideal for indulging in your own sour craving!

Give your customers a tangy and sour bite with the Jolly Rancher Bites Sour Chewy Candy!

6.5 oz. Bags | 12 Count Box

Fresh Jolly Rancher Candy Shipped Fast at Wholesale Prices!

entry.title: Jolly Rancher Original Flavours Hard Candy - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Candy
Price: 42.00

Keep on Sucking Jolly Rancher Candy

Take your candy craving customers on a fruity and bold, flavour-filled adventure with the Jolly Rancher Original Flavors Hard Candy! Your customers will love tasting this very classic candy. Coming out in 1949, this old fashioned candy has been a favourite candy for generations! Jolly Rancher Original Flavors Hard Candy comes in five fabulous flavours, Cherry, Grape, Watermelon, Raspberry and Apple. Each candy is bold and fruity with a perfectly smooth texture!

Be an Original, with the deliciousness of Jolly Rancher Original Flavors Hard Candy!

7 oz. Bags | 12 Count Box

Fresh Retro Candy Shipped Fast at Wholesale Prices!

entry.title: Jolly Rancher Cinnamon Fire Hard Candy - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Candy
Price: 42.00

Keep on Sucking Jolly Rancher Candy

We know your mother always told you not you play with fire, but ignore her, just in this one case! The Jolly Rancher Cinnamon Fire Hard Candy are certainly not for the faint of heart! This red, hard candy is a sweet rendition of spicy cinnamon! Made for the daring candy lovers out there, you know who you are! Bold and long-lasting flavours are what this Jolly Rancher Candy is really all about!

Ignite your customer's tastebuds into the hot world of candy oblivion with the bold taste of Jolly Rancher Cinnamon Fire Hard Candy!

7 oz. Bags | 12 Count Box

Fresh Retro Candy Shipped Fast at Wholesale Prices!

Ingredients:

Corn syrup, sugar, contains 2% or less of: natural and artificial flavour, artificial colour (red 40).
